Appreciation 
 Thank you Andela

 Love to learn more!!
 #TIA
 #ALCNigeriaWithGoogle
 Thanks Indie Development
 Thanks Stack Overflow
 Thanks Friends and Family
 Love You All!!!

About
 This app allows you to play a game of tic tac toe against Andy (the computer).
 The rounds will rotate who gets to play first.
 Also the app keeps track of scores!
